HierCondHlthCodeMapping.name: HierCondHlthCodeMapping
HierCondHlthCodeMapping.description: Represents how Hierarchical Condition Category (HCC) codes map to condition codes for a specific year.

ConditionCodeId.description: The health condition code thatâ€™s mapped to a Hierarchical Condition Category (HCC) code.

EffectiveEndYear.description: The year till when the mapping is valid.

EffectiveStartYear.description: The year from when the mapping is valid.

HierarchicalCondCategoryCodeId.description: The HCC code that a health condition code is mapped to.

IsActive.description: Indicates that the specified health condition and HCC code mapping is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The system-generated name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record in the system.

PublishedYear.description: The year when the specified mapping was published.
